text: Ramón Luperón is a rower from Cuba. Luperón competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics, 1972 Summer Olympics and the 1976 Summer Olympics. He was born on 24 May 1946.Ramón Luperón == References == Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban rowers Category:Olympians for Cuba
title: Ramón Luperón
